In vitro studies demonstrated that IL-10 directly regulates synthesis and degradation of various extracellular matrix molecules by different fibroblastic cell types. It was demonstrated that IL-10 down-regulates mRNA expression of collagen I and fibronectin, but up-regulates decorin and collagenase-1 in a time- and dose-dependent manner in human skin fibroblasts
44 . These effects seem to be related to the inhibition of TGF-Î²1 pathway
44 .
